alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 3:03AM CDT until October 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected with periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Periods of winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southwestern Pecos County including the Glass Mountains, Davis Mountains, and Davis Mountains Foothills. Including parts of Highway 118 and Hwy 385. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Ice will be difficult to identify in the dark. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute, plan extra time for your trip.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos
